summary.description:
predicting fusion neoantigens from RNA sequencing data.

The Section for Bioinformatrics at the Biocenter of Innsbruck Medical University is commited to the generation, management, integration, and leveraging data from genomics studies.

Quantification of the tumor immune contexture.

Zlatko Trajanoski awarded with ERC Advanced Grant.
